articles.title: Scientists Develop Incredibly Lightweight Material 4 Times Stronger Than Steel - SciTechDaily

articles.title: World Rabies Day: IIT Guwahati spreads awareness on viral zoonotic disease - ANI News
articles.description: The Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) observed World Rabies Day on September 28 with multiple activities and initiatives to spread awareness about this fatal, yet preventable disease.
